title: Light Blue
desc:
- This color is a base color.
- May also be played off of <:blue:1106234079055200378> and <:white:1107514189574045726>.
- If the top card is a <:lightblue:1120572625865949194> card, instead of drawing a card when you cannot play, you may instead convert any card in your hand into a <:blue:1106234079055200378> or a <:white:1107514189574045726> card, then skip your turn.
